a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisBDelayedStartLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.Delayed start) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 3-dose schedule (no birth dose + 3 doses), delayed start * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisBDelayedStartLogic

def.name: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "Client's age is more than {Member States defined lower limit}"

operand.name: No hepatitis B doses were administered
Client's age is more than {Member States defined lower limit}

def.name: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.

a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Two hepatitis B doses have been administered to the client. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Two hepatitis B doses have been administered to the client. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered more than 6 months ago and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered more than 6 months ago and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

expression.name: Three hepatitis B doses were administered

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

operand.name: Guidance
Guidance

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for hepatitis B vaccination"

'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as hepatitis B birth dose was not administered. The first hepatitis B dose should be administered as soon as possible. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Two hepatitis B doses have been administered to the client. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the first hepatitis B dose was administered more than 6 months ago and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete. Three hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
